Key Arguments: The government lacks competency and credibility in dealing with truth.
The proposed legislation is seen as a tool for censorship to silence dissent and political diversity.
The legislation is viewed as anti-democratic and potentially leading to tyranny.
Western governments have been incompetent and partisan in handling misinformation and disinformation.
Governments cannot be trusted with the truth, and freedom of speech must be protected.
Notable Quotes: Censorship is not about truth but is rather the plaything of the powerful to silence dissent and political diversity.
Truth will never be defined by ACMA or government alone!!!
